channel.title: krishna-chaitanya on Bhakta Handbook

item.title: Panca-tattva Maha Mantra
item.description: jaya sri-krishna-chaitanya prabhu nityananda sri-adwaita gadadhara shrivasadi-gaura-bhakta-vrinda I offer my respectful obeisances unto Sri Caitanya Mahaprabhu, Lord Nityananda, Sri Advaita, Gadadhara Pandit, Srivas Thakur, and all the devotees of Lord Caitanya. Lord Sri Caitanya Mahaprabhu is always accompanied by His very confidential associates such as Sri Nityananda, Sri Gadadhara and Sri Adwaita and by many devotees like Srivasa. Lord Caitanya is the most merciful incarnation of Sri Krsna and His associates are even more merciful.
